biography:
Elijah M. "Eli" Craig (born May 25, 1972 in Los Angeles) is a Writer/Director, who started his Hollywood career with a few small acting jobs.

His first full-length film as writer/director was the horror comedy movie Tucker & Dale vs Evil, which took three years to complete.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Eli Craig, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Eli Craig
